1377: Flore was born in Breestraat in 1377.
1378: Lost sibling Waldrada in 1378 when Waldrada was 4.
1383: Lost mother at the age of 6 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 6.
Adolfus took care of Flore since Flore was 7.
